remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是泛型的對等類別。The class is the generic equivalent of the class. 它會實作需要使用陣列做為動態增加其大小的泛型介面。It implements the generic interface by using an array whose size is dynamically increased as required. 您可以將項目加入使用或方法。You can add items to a by using the or methods. 類別會使用相等比較子和排序比較子。The class uses both an equality comparer and an ordering comparer. - 這類方法， ， ，和為清單元素使用相等比較子。Methods such as , , , and use an equality comparer for the list elements. 類型的預設相等比較子`T`決定，如下所示。The default equality comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果型別`T`實作泛型介面，則相等比較子是方法的介面; 否則預設的相等比較子是。If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the equality comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, the default equality comparer is . - 這類方法和為清單元素使用排序比較子。Methods such as and use an ordering comparer for the list elements. 類型的預設比較子`T`決定，如下所示。The default comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果型別`T`實作泛型介面，則預設比較子是方法的介面; 否則如果型別`T`實作非泛型介面，則預設值比較子會是該介面的方法。If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, if type `T` implements the nongeneric interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface. 如果型別`T`實作都沒有介面，則沒有任何預設比較子，並必須明確地提供比較子或比較委派。If type `T` implements neither interface, then there is no default comparer, and a comparer or comparison delegate must be provided explicitly. 不保證排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 必須排序之前執行的作業 (例如) 需要的來排序。You must sort the before performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 可以使用整數索引來存取此集合中的項目。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 針對大型物件，您可以藉由設定增加到 64 位元系統上的 2 億元素的最大容量`enabled`屬性的組態項目`true`在執行階段環境中。For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 接受`null`參考有效的值類型，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 不可變的新版類別，請參閱。For an immutable version of the class, see . ## 效能考量Performance Considerations 決定是否要使用或類別，這兩者都有類似的功能，請記住，類別在大部分情況下更好，和為型別安全。In deciding whether to use the or class, both of which have similar functionality, remember that the class performs better in most cases and is type safe. 如果用於型別參考型別`T`的類別，這兩個類別的行為是相同。If a reference type is used for type `T` of the class, the behavior of the two classes is identical. 不過，如果實值型別用於型別`T`，您必須考慮實作和 boxing 問題。However, if a value type is used for type `T`, you need to consider implementation and boxing issues. 如果類型使用實值類型`T`，編譯器會產生的實作特別針對該實值類型的類別。If a value type is used for type `T`, the compiler generates an implementation of the class specifically for that value type. 這表示的清單項目物件沒有可以使用的項目，再建立約 500 名 list 元素之後儲存不 boxing list 元素的記憶體是否大於用來產生類別實作的記憶體為 boxed。That means a list element of a object does not have to be boxed before the element can be used, and after about 500 list elements are created the memory saved not boxing list elements is greater than the memory used to generate the class implementation. 請確定用於類型的實值型別`T`實作泛型介面。Make certain the value type used for type `T` implements the generic interface. 如果不是，這類方法必須呼叫方法，方塊受影響的清單項目。If not, methods such as must call the method, which boxes the affected list element. 如果值型別實作介面，以及您擁有原始碼，也實作泛型介面，以防止和boxing list 元素的方法。If the value type implements the interface and you own the source code, also implement the generic interface to prevent the and methods from boxing list elements. 如果您並未擁有原始碼，則傳遞物件和方法If you do not own the source code, pass an object to the and methods 它會對您來說，若要使用的特定類型的實作類別，而不是使用類別或撰寫您自己的強類型包裝函式集合。It is to your advantage to use the type-specific implementation of the class instead of using the class or writing a strongly typed wrapper collection yourself. 原因是您的實作必須執行.NET Framework 的用途為您，而且 common language runtime 可以共用的 Microsoft 中繼語言程式碼和中繼資料，您的實作不能。The reason is your implementation must do what the .NET Framework does for you already, and the common language runtime can share Microsoft intermediate language code and metadata, which your implementation cannot. ## F # 的考量F# Considerations 類別不常用於 F # 程式碼。The class is used infrequently in F# code. 相反地，[列出](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d)，這是不變且單向連結清單會通常慣用。Instead, [Lists](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d), which are immutable, singly-linked lists, are typically preferred. F # 清單提供排序、 不可變的序列的值，並支援以使用功能性方式開發。An F# List provides an ordered, immutable series of values, and is supported for use in functional-style development. 當從 F #類別通常都有[ResizeArray\<' T >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx)類型縮寫，以避免命名衝突的 F # 清單When used from F#, the class is typically referred to by the [ResizeArray\<'T>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx) type abbreviation to avoid naming conflicts with F# Lists ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入、 移除和插入簡單商務物件中的。The following example demonstrates how to add, remove, and insert a simple business object in a . (如需的複雜型別，請參閱方法。)(For an example of a of complex types, see the method.) 預設建構函式用來建立字串清單的預設容量。The default constructor is used to create a list of strings with the default capacity. 屬性顯示，然後方法用來加入數個項目。The property is displayed and then the method is used to add several items. 列出項目，而屬性會顯示一次，連同屬性，以顯示 視需要已增加容量。The items are listed, and the property is displayed again, along with the property, to show that the capacity has been increased as needed. 方法用來測試是否有在清單中，項目的方法用來插入新項目清單中，中間和清單的內容會顯示一次。The method is used to test for the presence of an item in the list, the method is used to insert a new item in the middle of the list, and the contents of the list are displayed again. 預設值屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 用來擷取項目，方法用來移除重複的項目之前，加入第一個執行個體和內容會顯示一次。The default property (the indexer in C#) is used to retrieve an item, the method is used to remove the first instance of the duplicate item added earlier, and the contents are displayed again. 方法一律會移除它遇到第一個執行個體。The method always removes the first instance it encounters. 方法用來減少的容量，以符合計數，而和屬性會顯示。The method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量已低於 10%的總容量，清單就不調整大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最後，方法用來從清單中，移除所有項目和和屬性會顯示。Finally, the method is used to remove all items from the list, and the and properties are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可以使用來估計，建構函式，並指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, using the constructor and specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量方法或藉由設定屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly. 減少容量重新配置記憶體和中的所有項目複製。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範的預設建構函式泛型類別。The following example demonstrates the default constructor of the generic class. 預設建構函式會建立預設的容量，以清單顯示所示屬性。The default constructor creates a list with the default capacity, as demonstrated by displaying the property. 此範例新增、 插入，並移除項目，顯示容量的變更方式為這些方法會使用。The example adds, inserts, and removes items, showing how the capacity changes as these methods are used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中項目的順序會保留在。The order of the elements in the collection is preserved in the . 如果新(目前再加上集合的大小) 將會超過、 容量的增加的自動重新配置以容納新項目，在內部陣列和加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If the new (the current plus the size of the collection) will be greater than , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added. 如果可容納新項目，而不會增加，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是要加入的項目數。If the can accommodate the new elements without increasing the , this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added. 如果需要增加，以容納新項目容量，這個方法會變成 O (*n* + *m*) 作業，其中*n*是項目數目要加入和*m*是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new elements, this method becomes an O(*n* + *m*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added and *m* is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範以及各種其他方法的處理範圍的類別。The following example demonstrates the method and various other methods of the class that act on ranges. 建立並傳遞至建構函式，填入陣列的項目清單的字串陣列。An array of strings is created and passed to the constructor, populating the list with the elements of the array. 呼叫方法時，使用當做其引數清單。The method is called, with the list as its argument. 結果是清單的，將目前項目加入清單中，複製所有元素的結尾。The result is that the current elements of the list are added to the end of the list, duplicating all the elements. summary.span: 傳回目前集合的唯讀 包裝函式。

span.span: Returns a read-only wrapper for the current collection.

returns.span: 此物件作為唯讀包裝函式包住目前的 。

span.span: An object that acts as a read-only wrapper around the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免的任何修改物件，請將它公開只能透過這個包裝函式。To prevent any modifications to the object, expose it only through this wrapper. A物件未公開修改該集合的方法。A object does not expose methods that modify the collection. 不過，如果變更基礎物件、 唯讀集合會反映這些變更。However, if changes are made to the underlying object, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. A的字串容量的 4 建立，因為最終大小的清單是否已知為完全 4。A of strings with a capacity of 4 is created, because the ultimate size of the list is known to be exactly 4. 透過四個字串，會填入此清單和方法用來取得唯讀包裝原始清單的泛型介面實作。The list is populated with four strings, and the method is used to get a read-only generic interface implementation that wraps the original list. 將原始清單的項目設定為"Coelophysis 」 使用屬性 （索引子在 C# 中） 和唯讀清單的內容會顯示一次以示範它是只原始的清單包裝函式。An element of the original list is set to "Coelophysis" using the property (the indexer in C#), and the contents of the read-only list are displayed again to demonstrate that it is just a wrapper for the original list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用預設比較子類型`T`決定清單項目的順序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 屬性檢查是否輸入`T`實作泛型介面，並使用該實作，如果有的話。The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果沒有，檢查是否輸入`T`實作介面。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果型別`T`未實作任何一種介面，會擲回。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 必須先排序依據的比較子實作; 否則結果就是不正確。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 比較`null`具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況，當使用泛型介面。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，以及它可能會傳回其中一個相符項目，不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 插入到值時，這個索引應該做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (記錄*n*) 作業，其中*n*是範圍的項目數目。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法多載而方法多載。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. A的字串會建立並填入具有四個字串，不依特定順序。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 方法多載然後用來搜尋兩個字串不在清單中，而方法用來將其插入。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 傳回值方法是在每個案例中，負數的因為字串不在清單中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 採取的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 的這個負的數字會產生第一個元素的清單中，在此位置是大於搜尋字串，並插入索引會保留排序順序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二個搜尋字串大於任何項目在清單中，所以插入位置在清單的結尾。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較子自訂元素的比較方式。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，您可以使用與執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子執行個體。For example, you can use a instance as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`提供的項目指定使用指定的值比較實作。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`是`null`，預設的比較子檢查是否輸入`T`實作泛型介面，並使用該實作，如果有的話。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果沒有，檢查是否輸入`T`實作介面。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果型別`T`未實作任何一種介面，會擲回。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws . 必須先排序依據的比較子實作; 否則結果就是不正確。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 比較`null`具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況，當使用泛型介面。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，以及它可能會傳回其中一個相符項目，不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 插入到值時，這個索引應該做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (記錄*n*) 作業，其中*n*是範圍的項目數目。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法多載而方法多載。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 此範例會定義名為 DinoCompare，實作字串的替代比較子`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的運作方式如下： 第一次，針對測試比較元`null`，而且 null 的參考被視為小於一個非 null。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 第二，進行比較的字串長度，以及較長的字串會視為大於。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果長度相等，則使用一般的字串比較。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. A的字串會建立並填入具有四個字串，不依特定順序。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單會顯示，使用替代的比較子，排序並且再次顯示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 方法多載然後用來搜尋不在清單中，採用的替代的比較子的數個字串。The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用來插入的字串。The method is used to insert the strings. 這兩種方法位於名為函式`SearchAndInsert`，以及程式碼，要採取的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 所傳回的負數的並使用它做為索引插入新的字串。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. 否則結果就是不正確。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 比較`null`具有任何參考類型允許和不會產生例外狀況，當使用泛型介面。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果只會包含一個以上的項目具有相同的值，此方法會傳回其中一個相符項目，以及它可能會傳回其中一個相符項目，不一定是第一個。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將位元補數運算 （~） 套用至這個負整數，以取得大於搜尋值的第一個元素的索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 插入到值時，這個索引應該做為插入點用來維護的排序次序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 這個方法是 O (記錄*n*) 作業，其中*n*是範圍的項目數目。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法多載而方法多載。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 此範例會定義名為 DinoCompare，實作字串的替代比較子`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的運作方式如下： 第一次，針對測試比較元`null`，而且 null 的參考被視為小於一個非 null。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 第二，進行比較的字串長度，以及較長的字串會視為大於。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果長度相等，則使用一般的字串比較。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. A的字串會建立並填入具有五個 herbivorous 恐龍和三個肉食恐龍的名稱。A of strings is created and populated with the names of five herbivorous dinosaurs and three carnivorous dinosaurs. 在每個兩個群組中，名稱不是任何特定排序順序。Within each of the two groups, the names are not in any particular sort order. 清單會顯示、 使用的替代的比較子來排序草食的範圍和清單會顯示一次。The list is displayed, the range of herbivores is sorted using the alternate comparer, and the list is displayed again. 方法多載然後用來搜尋 「 Brachiosaurus"草食的範圍。The method overload is then used to search only the range of herbivores for "Brachiosaurus". 找不到字串，以及位元補數 (~ 運算子在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 所傳回的負數的方法用於做為索引插入新的字串。The string is not found, and the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by the method is used as an index for inserting the new string. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的項目數，可以儲存需要，調整大小之前而是實際的項目數目。 is the number of elements that the can store before resizing is required, whereas is the number of elements that are actually in the . 永遠是大於或等於。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過時加入項目，複製的舊項目並加入新項目之前，自動重新配置內部陣列增加容量。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 如果容量更大的計數，而且您想要減少所使用的記憶體，您可以藉由呼叫來減少容量方法或藉由設定屬性明確設為較低的值。If the capacity is significantly larger than the count and you want to reduce the memory used by the , you can decrease capacity by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly to a lower value. 當值設定明確地內部陣列也重新配置到符合指定的容量，並將複製的所有項目。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity, and all the elements are copied. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。將屬性設定為 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是新的容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the new capacity. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何檢查的容量和計數的包含簡單商務物件，並說明如何使用方法，以移除額外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下列範例所示屬性清單的生命週期中的數個點。The following example shows the property at several points in the life of a list. 預設建構函式用來建立字串清單使用的容量為 0，而顯示屬性，以示範這點。The default constructor is used to create a list of strings with a capacity of 0, and the property is displayed to demonstrate this. 之後方法已經用來新增數個項目，項目會列出，然後屬性會顯示一次，連同屬性，以顯示 視需要已增加容量。After the method has been used to add several items, the items are listed, and then the property is displayed again, along with the property, to show that the capacity has been increased as needed. 屬性之後，再次顯示方法用來減少的容量，以符合計數。The property is displayed again after the method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count. 最後，方法用來從清單中，移除所有項目和和屬性會顯示一次。Finally, the method is used to remove all items from the list, and the and properties are displayed again. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用複製項目。This method uses to copy the elements. 將元素複製到以相同的順序，以列舉值逐一。The elements are copied to the in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the . 這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是`count`。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下列範例示範的所有三個多載方法。The following example demonstrates all three overloads of the method. A的字串會建立並填入具有 5 個字串。A of strings is created and populated with 5 strings. 建立空白的字串陣列的 15 項目，而方法多載用來將清單中的所有元素都複製到開始於陣列的第一個元素的陣列。An empty string array of 15 elements is created, and the method overload is used to copy all the elements of the list to the array beginning at the first element of the array. 方法多載用來複製所有的項目清單的陣列索引 6 開始的陣列 （讓索引 5 空白）。The method overload is used to copy all the elements of the list to the array beginning at array index 6 (leaving index 5 empty). 最後，方法多載用來複製 3 個元素，從清單中，從索引 2 開始，到開始於陣列的陣列索引 12 （讓索引 11 空白）。Finally, the method overload is used to copy 3 elements from the list, beginning with index 2, to the array beginning at array index 12 (leaving index 11 empty). 陣列的內容隨即顯示。The contents of the array are then displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至的委派，以及處理會停止時找到相符項目。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when a match is found. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範和方法，其中包含實作簡單商務物件。The following example demonstrates the and methods on a that contains a simple business object that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範以及數個使用其他方法泛型委派。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use the generic delegate. A字串的建立，其中包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". ， ，和方法會用於搜尋與搜尋述詞方法的清單，然後方法用來移除所有項目結尾"saurus"。The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method, and then the method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 最後，方法呼叫。Finally, the method is called. 周遊清單開頭，接著為傳遞每個項目從`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋時，會停止，則方法會傳回`true`如果`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`的任何項目。The search stops and the method returns `true` if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for any element. 方法會傳回`false`由於所有這類項目已經移除。The method returns `false` because all such elements have been removed. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. remarks.format:
## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至委派，在中向前移動、 第一個元素開始和結尾最後一個項目。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving forward in the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 搜尋時包含實值類型的清單，請確定類型的預設值不符合搜尋述詞。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否則，就沒有預設值，指出沒有相符項目找不到與那麼類型的預設值的清單項目之間進行區別。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 預設值符合此搜尋述詞，如果使用方法改為。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法，其中包含簡單的複雜物件。The following example demonstrates the method on a that contains a simple complex object. C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找所有書籍，其`Genre`屬性是 「 電腦 」 使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Find all books that whose `Genre` property is "Computer" using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找具有發行日期之前 2001 年、 使用集合中的最後一本書`PubBefore2001`述詞的委派。Finds the last book in the collection that has a publish date before 2001, using the `PubBefore2001` predicate delegate.

C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找第一個電腦活頁簿使用的索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找上次電腦活頁簿使用索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的第一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的最後一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋向前第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至委派。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委派的簽章：The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Employee`類別包含兩個欄位，`Name`和`Id`。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它也會定義`EmployeeSearch`類別具有單一方法， `StartsWith`，指出是否`Employee.Name`欄位開頭為指定的子字串提供給`EmployeeSearch`類別建構函式。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 請注意此方法的簽章Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 對應到可以傳遞至委派的簽章方法。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 此範例會具現化`List`物件中加入一些`Employee`上限，然後呼叫方法兩次來搜尋整個集合，也就是第一次第一個`Employee`物件，其`Name`欄位開始使用"J"和第二次是第一`Employee`物件，其`Name`欄位開頭為"Ju"。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objets to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection , the first time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J", and the second time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format: ## Remarks 開始向前搜尋`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。The is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至委派。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委派的簽章：The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是`count`。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Employee`類別包含兩個欄位，`Name`和`Id`。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它也會定義`EmployeeSearch`類別具有單一方法， `StartsWith`，指出是否`Employee.Name`欄位開頭為指定的子字串提供給`EmployeeSearch`類別建構函式。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 請注意此方法的簽章Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 對應到可以傳遞至委派的簽章方法。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 此範例會具現化`List`物件中加入一些`Employee`上限，然後呼叫方法兩次來搜尋整個集合 (也就是成員從索引 0 至索引-1)。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objets to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection (that is, the members from index 0 to index - 1). 第一次，它會搜尋第一個`Employee`物件，其`Name`欄位開頭為"J"; 第二次，它會搜尋第一個`Employee`物件，其`Name`欄位開頭為"Ju"。The first time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J"; the second time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format:
## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至委派，在中向後移動、 最後一個元素開始和結束的第一個元素。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving backward in the , starting with the last element and ending with the first element. 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 搜尋時包含實值類型的清單，請確定類型的預設值不符合搜尋述詞。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否則，就沒有預設值，指出沒有相符項目找不到與那麼類型的預設值的清單項目之間進行區別。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 預設值符合此搜尋述詞，如果使用方法改為。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範尋找方法類別。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 如範例類別包含`book`類別的物件`Book`，使用中的資料[範例 XML 檔： 書籍 (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). `FillList`方法範例中的會使用[LINQ to XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)剖析到的屬性值的 xml 值`book`物件。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表描述為 find 方法提供的範例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|範例Example| |------------|-------------| ||找到識別碼使用活頁簿`IDToFind`述詞的委派。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找所有書籍，其`Genre`屬性是 「 電腦 」 使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Find all books that whose `Genre` property is "Computer" using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找具有發行日期之前 2001 年、 使用集合中的最後一本書`PubBefore2001`述詞的委派。Finds the last book in the collection that has a publish date before 2001, using the `PubBefore2001` predicate delegate.

C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找第一個電腦活頁簿使用的索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找上次電腦活頁簿使用索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的第一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的最後一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`減去`count`再加上 1，如果`count`大於 0。The is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至委派。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是`count`。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範尋找方法類別。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 如範例類別包含`book`類別的物件`Book`，使用中的資料[範例 XML 檔： 書籍 (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). `FillList`方法範例中的會使用[LINQ to XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)剖析到的屬性值的 xml 值`book`物件。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表描述為 find 方法提供的範例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|範例Example| |------------|-------------| ||找到識別碼使用活頁簿`IDToFind`述詞的委派。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找所有書籍，其`Genre`屬性是 「 電腦 」 使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Find all books that whose `Genre` property is "Computer" using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找具有發行日期之前 2001 年、 使用集合中的最後一本書`PubBefore2001`述詞的委派。Finds the last book in the collection that has a publish date before 2001, using the `PubBefore2001` predicate delegate.

C# 範例會使用在匿名委派。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||尋找第一個電腦活頁簿使用的索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找上次電腦活頁簿使用索引`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的第一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||尋找索引的最後一個電腦活頁簿中第二個一半的集合，使用`FindComputer`述詞的委派。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫。The property returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參考類型的集合或子集該集合的淺層複本只包含參考的集合項目。A shallow copy of a collection of reference types, or a subset of that collection, contains only the references to the elements of the collection. 不會複製物件本身。The objects themselves are not copied. 新的清單中的參考會指向原始的清單中的參考相同的物件。The references in the new list point to the same objects as the references in the original list. 淺層複本實值類型的集合或子集該集合，包含集合的元素。A shallow copy of a collection of value types, or a subset of that collection, contains the elements of the collection. 不過，如果集合的元素會包含其他物件的參考，不會複製這些物件。However, if the elements of the collection contain references to other objects, those objects are not copied. 新集合的項目中參考指向原始集合的項目中參考相同的物件。The references in the elements of the new collection point to the same objects as the references in the elements of the original collection. 相反地，項目複製集合的深層複本，並直接或間接參考之項目，所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是`count`。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範以及的其他方法處理範圍的類別。The following example demonstrates the method and other methods of the class that act on ranges. 在此範例中，結尾方法用來取得從清單中，從索引位置 2 的三個項目。At the end of the example, the method is used to get three items from the list, beginning with index location 2. 方法會呼叫產生，建立三個元素的陣列。The method is called on the resulting , creating an array of three elements. 陣列的項目會顯示。The elements of the array are displayed. A字串的建立，其中包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". ， ，和方法可用來在清單中搜尋的搜尋述詞的方法。The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method. 方法用來移除所有項目結尾"saurus"。The method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 周遊清單開頭，接著為傳遞每個項目從`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 如果移除元素`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`。The element is removed if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context, and create it automatically. 最後，方法會驗證不是否在清單中以"saurus"結尾的任何字串。Finally, the method verifies that there are no strings in the list that end with "saurus". remarks.format:
## Remarks ## 多載的方法的語法Overloaded method syntax 方法可讓您使用預設比較子，在清單中，物件類型排序，或指定客戶排序方法。The methods enable you to sort with the default comparer for the object type in the list, or specify a customer sort method. [清單\。Sort()](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.Sort*)排序整個使用預設比較子的物件類型的清單中的項目保留在清單中。[List\.Sort()](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.Sort*) Sorts the elements in the entire list using the default comparer of the object type held in the list. [清單\。排序 M (比較\ 比較)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29)排序整個使用指定的比較子的清單中的項目。[List\.Sort M(Comparison\ comparison)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29) Sorts the elements in the entire list using the specified comparer. [清單\。排序 (IComparer\ 比較子)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%600%7D%29)排序整個使用指定的清單中的項目。[List\.Sort(IComparer\ comparer)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%600%7D%29) Sorts the elements in the entire list using the specified . [清單\。排序 (Int32 索引，Int32 計數 IComparer\ 比較子)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%600%7D%29)排序項目範圍內使用指定的比較子的清單中的項目。[List\.Sort(Int32 index, Int32 count, IComparer\ comparer)](xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%600%7D%29) Sorts the elements in a range of elements in list using the specified comparer. ## 參數Parameters |參數Parameter|類型Type|描述Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`comparison`||要比較元素時所使用的委派方法The delegate method to use when comparing elements| |比較子comparer||比較項目時所使用或 null 表示使用預設比較子實作。The implementation to use when comparing elements, or null to use the default comparer .| |`index`||要排序範圍內之以零為起始的起始索引。The zero-based starting index of the range to sort.| |`count`||要排序的範圍長度。The length of the range to sort.| ## 例外狀況Exceptions |例外Exception|條件Condition| |---------------|---------------| ||`comparer` 未指定或`null`，而且預設比較子找不到實作泛型介面或介面類型 t。`comparer` is not specified or `null`, and the default comparer cannot find implementation of the generic interface or the interface for type T.| ||`comparison` 為 `null`。`comparison` is `null`.| ||實作`comparison`或`comparer`在排序期間造成錯誤。The implementation of `comparison` or `comparer` caused an error during the sort. 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時，`comparison` 可能不會傳回 0。For example, `comparison` might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.

-或--or-

`index` 和 `count` 未指定 中的有效範圍。`index` and `count` do not specify a valid range in the .| ||`index` 小於 0 或`count`小於 0。`index` is less than 0 or `count` is less than 0.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用預設比較子類型`T`決定清單項目的順序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 屬性檢查是否輸入`T`實作泛型介面，並使用該實作，如果有的話。The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果沒有，檢查是否輸入`T`實作介面。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果型別`T`未實作任何一種介面，會擲回。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 這個方法會使用方法，適用於內省式排序，如下所示：This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用插入排序演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 記錄*n*，其中*n*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用 Heapsort 演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否則，它會使用快速排序演算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 平均而言，這個方法是 O (*n*記錄*n*) 作業，其中*n*是; 最壞的情況下為 O (*n* 2) 作業。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下列範例會將一些名稱來`List`物件，會顯示未排序的順序，清單便會呼叫方法，然後顯示 已排序的清單。The following example adds some names to a `List` object, displays the list in unsorted order, calls the method, and then displays the sorted list. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/Sort1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/Sort1.vb#2)] 下列程式碼示範和簡單商務物件上的方法多載。The following code demonstrates the and method overloads on a simple business object. 呼叫方法會產生做為部分類型，使用預設比較子和使用匿名方法實作方法。Calling the method results in the use of the default comparer for the Part type, and the method is implemented by using an anonymous method. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範方法多載而方法多載。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. A的字串會建立並填入具有四個字串，不依特定順序。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 方法多載然後用來搜尋兩個字串不在清單中，而方法用來將其插入。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 傳回值方法是在每個案例中，負數的因為字串不在清單中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 採取的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 的這個負的數字會產生第一個元素的清單中，在此位置是大於搜尋字串，並插入索引會保留排序順序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二個搜尋字串大於任何項目在清單中，所以插入位置在清單的結尾。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`提供的項目使用指定的排序實作。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are sorted using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`是`null`，預設的比較子檢查是否輸入`T`實作泛型介面，並使用該實作，如果有的話。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果沒有，檢查是否輸入`T`實作介面。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果型別`T`未實作任何一種介面，會擲回。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 這個方法會使用方法，適用於內省式排序，如下所示：This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用插入排序演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 記錄*n*，其中*n*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用 Heapsort 演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否則，它會使用快速排序演算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 平均而言，這個方法是 O (*n*記錄*n*) 作業，其中*n*是; 最壞的情況下為 O (*n* 2) 作業。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法多載而方法多載。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 此範例會定義名為 DinoCompare，實作字串的替代比較子`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的運作方式如下： 第一次，針對測試比較元`null`，而且 null 的參考被視為小於一個非 null。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 第二，進行比較的字串長度，以及較長的字串會視為大於。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果長度相等，則使用一般的字串比較。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. A的字串會建立並填入具有四個字串，不依特定順序。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單會顯示，使用替代的比較子，排序並且再次顯示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 方法多載然後用來搜尋不在清單中，採用的替代的比較子的數個字串。The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用來插入的字串。The method is used to insert the strings. 這兩種方法位於名為函式`SearchAndInsert`，以及程式碼，要採取的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 所傳回的負數的並使用它做為索引插入新的字串。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: ，可用於逐一查看集合。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫。The property returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 在極少數的案例，其中列舉競用權限寫入，您可以鎖定在整個列舉過程的集合。In the rare case where enumeration contends with write accesses, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理的所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 此位置未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 屬性會傳回相同的物件直到或呼叫。The property returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用記憶體降到最低集合的額外負荷如果沒有新的項目會加入至集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新配置及複製大型的成本相當大，但是，可能會因此方法沒有作用，如果清單是在超過容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 這可避免產生大型重新配置成本相對較小的改善。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. > [!NOTE] > 90%的目前閾值可能在未來版本中變更。The current threshold of 90 percent might change in future releases. 這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 若要重設設為初始狀態，請呼叫方法之前先呼叫方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling the method. 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 容量也可以設定使用屬性。The capacity can also be set using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何檢查的容量和計數的包含簡單商務物件，並說明如何使用方法，以移除額外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 數個屬性和方法類別可用來加入、 插入和移除項目從字串的清單。Several properties and methods of the class are used to add, insert, and remove items from a list of strings. 然後在方法用來減少的容量，以符合計數，而和屬性會顯示。Then the method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量已低於 10%的總容量，清單就不調整大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最後，會清除清單的內容。Finally, the contents of the list are cleared. remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 目前的項目分別傳遞至的委派，以及處理在委派傳回時停止`false`的任何項目。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when the delegate returns `false` for any element. 依順序處理項目，且所有呼叫都都會在單一執行緒上。The elements are processed in order, and all calls are made on a single thread. 這個方法是 O (*n*) 作業，其中*n*是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下列範例會示範以及數個使用其他方法泛型委派。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use generic delegate. A字串的建立，其中包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法周遊清單開頭，接著為傳遞每個項目從`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`false`。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
